Headline: Pink Line Service Delayed at 54th/Cermak
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are standing 54th/Cermak due to an unauthorized person on our tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are standing 54th/Cermak due to an unauthorized person on our tracks.

At this time, consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
